name: jira-express
description: Server to connect JIRA API and server in FE
author: riklakhe <rikeshlakhe@gmail.com>

scripts.build: concurrently "yarn run clean:build" "yarn run server:build" "yarn run app:build"
scripts.server:build: yarn install && mkdir dist && babel src --copy-files --out-dir dist --source-maps
scripts.app:build: cd app && yarn install && npm run build
scripts.server: concurrently "nodemon --watch .env --watch src --exec babel-node src --source-maps" "cd app && npm start"
